page.title: 07Employment-N.W.Edinburgh
page.content: The main employers are{FERRANTI}and {PARSONS PEEBLES,}who produce electronic equipment and light engineering. These firms, together with the{GAS BOARD,}provide work in a wide variety of jobs including scientists, secretaries, auditors, cleaners and caterers.{LOTHIAN HEALTH {BOARD}employs a large number of doctors, nurses and auxiliary staff at the{Western}and{Northern General {Hospitals.}Many of these are shift workers, some of whom work part time, with hours to suit their families' needs. At{TELFORD COLLEGE,}teachers hold classes in most subjects. Many more teachers work in the ten{PRIMARY {SCHOOLS}and three{HIGH SCHOOLS}in the area. All the buildings need clerical and maintenance workers. In some homes both parents are unemployed, but more often, one or other is working.
